Title: Bad Eggs
Plot: The students are given eggs to look after to teach them about parenthood but they aren't what they seem. Soon the eggs hatch and the creatures inside take over their owners and lead them to the school basement to dig up the mother creature.
GuestStars: Brie McCaddin, Eric Whitmore, Jeremy Ratchford, James Parks, Rick Zieff, Danny Strong, Kristine Sutherland
